message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $8,000. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this opportunity, I am proposing a special introductory price of $7,200. This offer is exclusive to you and won't be available after today. Please let me know if you are interested in securing this deal. Thank you for considering our product.
